alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 14 at 6:58AM CST until February 14 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Dense fog this morning. North winds around 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Stutsman County. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until Noon CST today. For the Wind Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Things left unsecured outside will be blown around. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow and blowing snow will reduce visibilities at times this afternoon and tonight.
info.instruction: If driving this morning, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Winds this afternoon and evening can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
